message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take it or leave it.
Alice, my turn.  I'm feeling generous, but this deal won't be around forever. The clock is ticking!
The deal is getting worse for you, Bob. Better take it while you still can!
Alice, let's be real - the value is slipping away with every round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
